quest.name: Spore Sweeper
journal: Ys Gyuf's eyes light up at the sight of you.
objectives: Find the owner of the gaze.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Ah, to have so many men visit us at once! This is a joyous day indeed!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: If it please you, please give me your patronage. As my patron, I ask that you remove the noxious mushrooms that grow in our cave. Flamespores, they're called.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: We would tend to them with magicks, except they leave behind a harmful ash. We've no choice but to pluck them one at a time.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Now, you will be curious as to what I have to offer. I am a purveyor of wares that will aid you in your travels. In exchange for your fitting payment, I will give you my choicest items!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Please let me know when you have removed all the flamespores. Scour every corner of the cave, leave no stone unturned!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: You've already removed the flamespores? How very quick you are!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Oh, but did you perchance search by the western entrance as well? I'm told that more have cropped up in that area.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: I'm told more flamespores have cropped up by the western entrance. Please tend to them as well!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: As you pluck the last of the flamespores, you sense a gaze from the entrance.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: <gasp>

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I-I wasn't spying on you or anything. I've just finished my task, and...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I...I should go and report back.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. Have you dealt with the flamespores by the western entrance as well?

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Excellent! No more poisonous spores irritating our noses, for a little while at least!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Oh dear, I believe I'm getting sentimental. Having a patron again...it reminds me of the old days. Fair every day, I would carry my wares to the castle to offer in exchange for men's patronage.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Back then the castle wasn't called Lyhe Ghiah. The Voeburtites built it, and they named it Gruenes Licht.

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: It was their last bastion in the struggle against sin eaters. And now they're gone, all of them. Nobles and knights and commonfolk alike...

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: But enough reminiscing─I must give you what you've earned!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: And if you desire anything else I possess, I would be glad to offer them to you─for a fitting price, of course!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Ys Gyuf's shop is now open for business!

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: Now, will you be offering your patronage to anyone else? If so, would you consider Wyd Lad?

dialogue.name: YSGYUF
dialogue.text: They've been under the weather of late, and the chance to perform an honorable task would cheer them up.
